item.title: 随着财政政策的转变，土耳其预算出现创纪录盈余
item.description: 随着政府转向修复公共财政，以配合旨在降低通胀的货币政策，土耳其公布了有史以来最大的月度预算盈余。【原文：Turkey posted its biggest monthly budget surplus on record as the government shifts to repairing public finances to complement monetary policies geared toward bringing down inflation.】

item.title: 瑞典 Cinclus Pharma 公司在斯德哥尔摩交易市场首次亮相即暴跌
item.description: 瑞典生物制药公司 Cinclus Pharma Holding AB 在斯德哥尔摩上市交易的第一天，股价就大幅下跌，这给此前欧洲最活跃的上市交易市场之一带来了打击。【原文：Swedish bio-pharmaceutical firm Cinclus Pharma Holding AB fell sharply on its first day of trading in Stockholm, in a blow to what was previously one of Europe’s most active listings markets.】

item.title: 中国人民银行顾问称中国应将出口重点放在全球南部地区
item.description: 中国央行的一位顾问说，中国政府应支持出口向发展中国家转移，这样才能找到有能力消化其工业产出的市场，并缓解与其他贸易伙伴的紧张关系。【原文：China’s government should back a shift of exports toward developing countries, so it can find markets with the capacity to digest its industrial output and ease tensions with other trade partners, said an adviser to the nation’s central bank.】

item.title: 丹麦减税吸引乐高和家族企业留下
item.description: 丹麦政府希望减税并放宽对家族企业的规定，以确保乐高公司（Lego A/S）等国宝留在这个北欧国家。【原文：Denmark’s government wants to cut taxes and ease rules for family-owned companies as it seeks to ensure that national treasures such as Lego A/S stay in the Nordic country.】

item.title: 美元广泛走强，印度卢比创历史新低
item.description: 印度卢比跌至历史新低，原因是美元走强拖累了大多数亚洲新兴货币。【原文：The Indian rupee declined to an all-time low as broad dollar strength weighed on most emerging Asian currencies.】

item.title: 挪威今年或将避免降息以冷却复苏经济
item.description: 挪威央行表示，今年下半年可能需要将借贷成本维持在2008年以来的最高水平，理由是担心通货膨胀会持续顽固。【原文：Norway’s central bank said it will probably need to keep borrowing costs at the highest level since 2008 for the rest of the year, citing worries that inflation will stay stubborn.】

item.title: 马丁称，瑞士央行将数字法郎试点至少延长两年
item.description: 瑞士国家银行理事会成员安托万-马丁（Antoine Martin）说，瑞士国家银行已决定继续进行央行数字货币批发发行试点，至少再持续两年。【原文：The Swiss National Bank has decided to continue its pilot of issuing of a wholesale central-bank digital currency for at least two more years, Governing Board member Antoine Martin said.】

item.description:

item.title: 瑞士联合银行再次降息援助经济并遏制法郎升势
item.description: 瑞士国家银行再次下调借贷成本，以放松对经济的限制，阻止法郎的上涨，此举与全球同行对宽松政策的犹豫不决形成了鲜明对比。【原文：The Swiss National Bank cut borrowing costs again to loosen constriction on the economy and stem gains in the franc, a move that contrasts with the hesitancy of global peers over easing.】

item.title: 中国经济持续放缓，瑞士5月钟表出口下降
item.description: 由于中国和香港对高档和奢侈钟表的需求持续放缓，5 月份瑞士钟表出口下降。【原文：Swiss watch exports fell in May as a slowdown in demand for premium and luxury timepieces in China and Hong Kong continued.】

item.title: 达斯称，印度央行的行动有助于抑制无担保信贷增长
item.description: 印度储备银行行长达斯（Shaktikanta Das）表示，印度储备银行抑制无担保信贷的措施有助于减少这些贷款的增长，从而缓解金融风险。【原文：The Reserve Bank of India’s measures to curb unsecured credit helped to reduce growth in those loans, Governor Shaktikanta Das said, easing financial risks.】

item.title: 肯尼亚抗议者要求鲁托额外承担 16 亿美元预算损失
item.description: 肯尼亚国家财政部警告说，撤销有争议的税收措施有可能给这个不得不寻求国际货币基金组织救助的国家带来 2,000 亿先令（16 亿美元）的资金缺口。【原文：Kenya’s National Treasury warned that withdrawing controversial tax measures risks creating a 200 billion shilling ($1.6 billion) financing hole for a nation that’s had to seek a bailout from the International Monetary Fund.】

item.title: 德国放弃从 Tennet 全面收购电网
item.description: 在国家财政紧张导致旷日持久的谈判终止后，柏林放弃了收购 Tennet Holding BV 电网德国部分的努力。【原文：Berlin scrapped its endeavor to buy the German portion of Tennet Holding BV’s power grid, after strained state finances put an end to the protracted talks.】

item.title: 俄罗斯新拦河坝一夜之间瞄准乌克兰电力系统
item.description: 随着弗拉基米尔-普京总统的部队继续发动攻击，破坏乌克兰的电力系统，俄罗斯一夜之间摧毁和破坏了乌克兰的能源设施。【原文：Russia destroyed and damaged Ukrainian energy facilities overnight as President Vladimir Putin’s forces continue attacks to disrupt the country’s power system.】

item.title: 中国转向废铜，为饥饿的冶炼厂提供食物
item.description: 随着冶炼厂寻求替代原材料以抵消开采矿石供应紧张的影响，中国加大了废铜的进口量。【原文：China has ramped up imports of copper scrap as smelters seek alternative raw materials to offset tight sipplied of mined ore.】

item.title: 欧洲 5 月汽车销量下降，驾驶者在等待更便宜的电动汽车
item.description: 欧洲汽车制造商 5 月份的汽车销量比去年同期减少了 2.6%，原因是买家对电动车型仍然居高不下的价格望而却步。【原文：Automakers in Europe sold 2.6% fewer vehicles in May than a year ago as buyers balked at the still-high prices of electric models.】

item.title: Evotec 因业绩下滑引发收购担忧，据称将聘请顾问
item.description: 知情人士称，德国药品开发商 Evotec SE 正在与国防顾问商谈，因为该公司的股价下跌引发了人们对其容易被收购的担忧。【原文：German drug developer Evotec SE is speaking to defense advisers after a decline in its share price prompted fears about the company’s vulnerability to a takeover, people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 英国富时 100 指数直播：英国央行决议前股市将迎来第三日上涨
Norinchukin 称无需额外资金，考虑投资日本国债
item.description: Norinchukin 银行表示，尽管本周对潜在损失的估计增加了两倍，但除了计划中的 1.2 万亿日元（76 亿美元）增资外，该银行不需要额外资金。【原文：Norinchukin Bank said it doesn’t need additional funds beyond a planned 1.2 trillion yen ($7.6 billion) capital raise, despite tripling an estimate of potential losses this week.】

item.title: 护肤品牌 Augustinus Bader 的销售额增长高达 40
item.description: 由前 BTG Pactual 银行家共同创立的护肤品牌 Augustinus Bader 今年有望实现高达 40% 的增长，因为这个新兴品牌摆脱了高端化妆品市场增长放缓的影响。【原文：Augustinus Bader, the skincare label co-founded by a former BTG Pactual banker, is on track to grow by as much as 40% this year as the upstart brand shrugs off a slowdown in high-end cosmetics.】

item.title: 法国政党开支--电力计划每年耗资超过 100 亿欧元
item.description: 根据蒙田研究所（Institut Montaigne）的密切关注分析，在法国临时立法选举中，与领先政党的购买力有关的竞选承诺可能会使三个集团中的任何一个每年损失超过 100 亿欧元（107 亿美元）。【原文：The campaign promises related to purchasing power of the leading parties in France’s snap legislative elections would likely cost more than €10 billion ($10.7 billion) per year for any of the three groups, according to closely watched analysis from the Institut Montaigne.】

item.title: 习近平的神秘中国人民银行计划出现多年来最大转变
item.description: 事情的起因是习近平主席在一本 172 页的金融业书籍中的一句隐晦的话。三个月后，中国货币政策多年来最大的转变计划开始浮出水面。【原文：It started with a cryptic quote from President Xi Jinping buried in a 172-page book on the financial sector. Three months later, plans for potentially the biggest shift in years in how China conducts monetary policy are starting to surface.】

item.title: 鲍比-詹在私人信贷热潮中面临 "风平浪静 "的融资困境
item.description: Bobby Jain 表示，他为新对冲基金筹集现金的努力面临着来自私人信贷公司的竞争，这些公司吸引了寻求替代策略的投资者。【原文：Bobby Jain signaled that efforts to raise cash for his new hedge fund faced competition from private credit firms that attracted investors looking for alternative strategies.】

item.title: 国庆旅游创纪录，石油牛市受提振
item.description: 在下月初的独立日假期期间，预计将有创纪录的近 7100 万美国人外出旅行，这为指望夏季驾车出行旺季需求增长的石油公司带来了希望。【原文：A record of almost 71 million Americans are expected to travel over the Independence Day holiday period early next month, providing hope for oil bulls counting on rising demand during the crucial summer driving season.】

item.title: 埃尔多安赢得了外国投资者的青睐，但土耳其人却付出了代价
item.description:

item.title: 法国国债拍卖是马克龙赌局以来的首次重大考验
item.description: 法国总统埃马纽埃尔-马克龙（Emmanuel Macron）宣布举行临时大选，震惊世界，令市场陷入低迷，自那以来，法国正准备首次出售债券。【原文：France is preparing to sell bonds for the first time since President Emmanuel Macron shocked the world by calling a snap election and sent markets into tailspin.】

item.title: 中国国企计划发行国内首只 50 年期企业债券
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，一家中国国有工业企业正在考虑发行 50 年期的国内债券，如果发行完成，这将是中国期限最长的公司债券。【原文：A state-owned Chinese industrial firm is considering to offer a 50-year domestic bond, according to people familiar with the matter, in what would be the nation’s longest-tenor corporate note if completed.】

item.title: 受合并猜测影响，SK Innovation 股价创 2021 年以来最大涨幅
item.description: 由于市场猜测这家韩国能源公司可能会与一家私营关联公司合并以增强竞争力，SK Innovation 公司的股票在该地区的 MSCI 亚太指数中涨幅居首。【原文：Shares of SK Innovation Co. topped gains on the regional MSCI Asia Pacific Index amid speculation the South Korean energy company may merge with a private affiliate to strengthen competitiveness.】

item.title: 汇丰银行借日元债券热潮从武士债券中融资 600 亿日元
item.description: 香港上海汇丰银行有限公司（Hongkong and Shanghai Banking Corp.）五年来首次发行武士债券（Samurai bond），募集资金 600 亿日元（3.8 亿美元），再次印证了近期海外发行商增加日元债券销售的趋势。【原文：Hongkong and Shanghai Banking Corp. raised ¥60 billion ($380 million) from its first Samurai bond offering in five years, reaffirming the recent trend of increasing yen note sales by overseas issuers.】
